caption.p: Projection of B. myriocephala and B. trimera samples according to the levels of volatile compounds in the essential oils ( A) and the factor loadings ( B). The red color represents the essential oils from Paraná State and the black color is related to the essential oil from São Paulo State. V = essential oil, Co = commercial samples, F = female specimens, M = male specimens, SP = São Paulo state, and PR = Paraná state.
